name: Core Collector (LOWREZJAM2020)
description:
Info:

Made in 9 hours and 26 minutes for LOWREZJAM 2020.

https://itch.io/jam/lowrezjam-2020

The game is limited to a resolution of 64x64 as per the rules.

Timelapse + Gameplay: Jam Comments:

There was some time left in the jam so I just threw this one together real quick.

Didn't turn out that great but I didn't exactly have much motivation making this so it's whatever. ;)

Description:

Collect the Core and return to the base before the green circular bar runs out.

The green bar is always draining but getting hit or crashing into walls drains it more.

Controls:

Arrows = Move.

D = Shoot.

Hold "S" = Keep stationary so you can aim with the arrows.

R = Restart.
